    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ApplicationDescriptor(java.lang.String name)
      Create the descriptor with the given name and assign a unique instance id automatically.
      ApplicationDescriptor(java.lang.String name, HierarchicalName classification)
      Create the descriptor with the given namespace and classification.
      ApplicationDescriptor(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String instanceID)
      Create the descriptor with the given name and instanceID without a classification.
      ApplicationDescriptor(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String instanceID, HierarchicalName classification)
      Create the descriptor with the given name and key.

      • ApplicationDescriptor

        public ApplicationDescriptor(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String instanceID)
        Create the descriptor with the given name and instanceID without a classification.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the application. This value will be returned by getApplicationNamespace().
        instanceID - a value that is unique across all nodes using the application name. If null, then a unique string will be chosen for the descriptor.

      • ApplicationDescriptor

        public ApplicationDescriptor(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String instanceID,
                     HierarchicalName classification)
        Create the descriptor with the given name and key.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the application. This value will be returned by getApplicationNamespace().
        instanceID - a value that is unique across all nodes using the application name. If null, then a unique string will be chosen for the descriptor.
        classification - the hierarchical classification of this descriptor.

    • Method Detail

      • getApplicationNamespace

        public java.lang.String getApplicationNamespace()
        Description copied from interface: IApplicationDescriptor
        Get the namespace/application name of this application instance.. The application name is a name that a set of cooperating applications may share. These cooperating applications are generally sharing tuples with the namespace defined by this application name.
        Specified by:
        getApplicationNamespace in interface IApplicationDescriptor
        Returns:
        never null.

      • getInstanceID

        public java.lang.String getInstanceID()
        Description copied from interface: IApplicationDescriptor
        The key value with with the application should be registered in an ITupleApplicationRegistry. This key must be unique within all application instances with the same name and is the value expected in the first column of Transport tuples. It is used to look up in URI scheme used by the application to receive tuples.
        Specified by:
        getInstanceID in interface IApplicationDescriptor
        Returns:
        never null.
